languages.text: "Есть лишь одно преступление тяжелее служения Сай'лантреш — предательство Детей Азуриана в ее угоду. Муаран видел пути, прозревал будущее... как мог он не заметить черного пятна на лице грядущего? Как мог не пустить все силы на то, чтобы избавить Лилэтан от этой язвы?!" {n}Голос Ирлиэт становится пронзительнее и яростнее.{/n} "Прежде чем я вырву это отравленное семя из тела Лилэтан, я заставлю Муарана ответить мне!"

traits.locale_text: "Есть лишь одно преступление тяжелее служения Сай'лантреш — предательство детей Асурьян в ее угоду. Муаран видел пути, прозревал будущее... как мог он не заметить черного пятна на лице грядущего? Как мог не пустить все силы на то, чтобы избавить Лилэтан от этой язвы?!" {n}Голос Ирлиэт становится пронзительнее и яростнее.{/n} "Прежде чем я вырву это отравленное семя из тела Лилэтан, я заставлю Муарана ответить мне!"

languages.text: "There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"
languages.original_text: "Есть лишь одно преступление тяжелее служения Сай'лантреш — предательство Детей Азуриана в ее угоду. Муаран видел пути, прозревал будущее... как мог он не заметить черного пятна на лице грядущего? Как мог не пустить все силы на то, чтобы избавить Лилэтан от этой язвы?!" {n}Голос Ирлиэт становится пронзительнее и яростнее.{/n} "Прежде чем я вырву это отравленное семя из тела Лилэтан, я заставлю Муарана ответить мне!"

Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

"There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

languages.text: 「セランスレッシュに従うよりも重い罪がひとつだけある。奴を利用するためにアシュリアンの御子らを裏切ることだ。ムアランはその道を、その未来を見た…どうしてムアランは、星の地表にある黒い汚れを見通せなかった？なぜこの腐朽からリラエタンを守るために全力を尽くさない？」{n}ユリエットの声が怒気を含むにつれ、舌鋒が鋭さを増す。{/n}「毒に冒されたこの種子をリラエタンの本体から引き剥がす前に、ムアランの口から答えを引き出す！」
languages.original_text: "There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

traits.locale_text: 「セランスレッシュに従うよりも重い罪がひとつだけある。奴を利用するためにアシュリアンの御子らを裏切ることだ。ムアランはその道を、その未来を見た…どうしてムアランは、星の地表にある黒い汚れを見通せなかった？なぜこの腐朽からリラエタンを守るために全力を尽くさない？」{n}ユリエットの声が怒気を含むにつれ、舌鋒が鋭さを増す。{/n}「毒に冒されたこの種子をリラエタンの本体から引き剥がす前に、ムアランの口から答えを引き出す！」

languages.text: “只有一种罪行比侍奉赛·兰斯雷什更严重，那就是为了她的利益而背叛阿苏焉的子嗣。穆兰看到了那些道路，也看到了未来……他怎么可能会看不到道路上黑暗的污点呢？他怎么可能对其听之任之，任其腐化莉莱赞呢？”{n}伊莉耶特的声音越来越愤怒，越来越刺耳。{/n}“在我把这颗毒种从莉莱赞挖出来之前，我要先让穆兰解释这一切！”
languages.original_text: "There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

traits.locale_text: “只有一种罪行比侍奉赛·兰斯雷什更严重，那就是为了她的利益而背叛阿苏焉的子嗣。穆兰看到了那些道路，也看到了未来……他怎么可能会看不到道路上黑暗的污点呢？他怎么可能对其听之任之，任其腐化莉莱赞呢？”{n}伊莉耶特的声音越来越愤怒，越来越刺耳。{/n}“在我把这颗毒种从莉莱赞挖出来之前，我要先让穆兰解释这一切！”

languages.text: «Solo hay una afrenta peor que servir a Sai'lanthresh, y es traicionar a los hijos de Asuryan en su nombre. Muaran vio las sendas, contempló el futuro... ¿cómo fue incapaz de ver la oscura mácula en su rostro? ¿Por qué no hizo todo lo que estuvo en su poder para librar al Lilaethan de este cáncer?». {n}La voz de Yrliet adquiere un tono furioso y cortante.{/n} «¡Antes de arrancar esta semilla emponzoñada del cuerpo del Lilaethan, arrancaré respuestas a Muaran!».
languages.original_text: "There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

traits.locale_text: «Solo hay una afrenta peor que servir a Sai'lanthresh, y es traicionar a los hijos de Asuryan en su nombre. Muaran vio las sendas, contempló el futuro... ¿cómo fue incapaz de ver la oscura mácula en su rostro? ¿Por qué no hizo todo lo que estuvo en su poder para librar al Lilaethan de este cáncer?». {n}La voz de Yrliet adquiere un tono furioso y cortante.{/n} «¡Antes de arrancar esta semilla emponzoñada del cuerpo del Lilaethan, arrancaré respuestas a Muaran!».

languages.text: "Nur ein Verbrechen ist schlimmer, als Sai'lanthresh zu dienen – Verrat an den Kindern von Asuryan zu ihren Gunsten. Muaran hat die Pfade gesehen, die Zukunft erblickt ... wie konnte er den dunklen Fleck im Gesicht nicht wahrnehmen? Wie konnte er nicht alles in seiner Macht Stehende tun, um Lileath von diesem Geschwür zu befreien?" {n}Yrliets Stimme wird wütender, schneidender.{/n} "Bevor ich diese vergiftete Saat aus Lileaths Körper reiße, werde ich Muaran zur Rede stellen!"
languages.original_text: "There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein Verbrechen ist schlimmer, als Sai'lanthresh zu dienen – Verrat an den Kindern von Asuryan zu ihren Gunsten. Muaran hat die Pfade gesehen, die Zukunft erblickt ... wie konnte er den dunklen Fleck im Gesicht nicht wahrnehmen? Wie konnte er nicht alles in seiner Macht Stehende tun, um Lileath von diesem Geschwür zu befreien?" {n}Yrliets Stimme wird wütender, schneidender.{/n} "Bevor ich diese vergiftete Saat aus Lileaths Körper reiße, werde ich Muaran zur Rede stellen!"

languages.text: « Je ne connais qu'un seul crime plus grave que celui de servir Sai'lanthresh : trahir les enfants d'Asuryan dans l'intérêt de l'Assoiffée. Muaran a vu les voies, il a contemplé l'avenir... Comment aurait-il pu ne pas remarquer la tache sombre qui le souille ? Pourquoi n'aurait-il pas fait tout ce qui était en son pouvoir pour débarrasser la lilaethan de ce fléau ? » {n}La voix d'Yrliet se fait plus énervée, plus perçante.{/n} « Avant que je n'arrache cette graine empoisonnée du corps de la lilaethan, j'obligerai Muaran à me donner des réponses ! »
languages.original_text: "There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne connais qu'un seul crime plus grave que celui de servir Sai'lanthresh : trahir les enfants d'Asuryan dans l'intérêt de l'Assoiffée. Muaran a vu les voies, il a contemplé l'avenir... Comment aurait-il pu ne pas remarquer la tache sombre qui le souille ? Pourquoi n'aurait-il pas fait tout ce qui était en son pouvoir pour débarrasser la lilaethan de ce fléau ? » {n}La voix d'Yrliet se fait plus énervée, plus perçante.{/n} « Avant que je n'arrache cette graine empoisonnée du corps de la lilaethan, j'obligerai Muaran à me donner des réponses ! »

languages.text: "Sai'lanthresh'e hizmet etmekten daha ağır tek bir suç var: Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na ihanet edip valiye çanak tutmak. Muaran yolları gördü, geleceği gördü... Yüzündeki karanlık lekeyi nasıl göremedi? Lilaethan'ı bu pislikten kurtarmak için elinden gelen her şeyi yapmayı nasıl başaramadı?" {n}Yrliet'in sesi daha öfkeli, daha keskin çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu zehir zıkkımı Lilaethan'dan söküp atmadan önce Muaran'a hepsinin hesabını soracağım!"
languages.original_text: "There is only one crime graver than serving Sai'lanthresh — it is betraying the Children of Asuryan for her benefit. Muaran saw the paths, he beheld the future... how could he not see the dark stain on its face? How could he fail to do everything in his power to rid the Lilaethan of this canker?" {n}Yrliet's voice grows angrier, more piercing.{/n} "Before I rip this poisoned seed from the Lilaethan's body, I will make Muaran answer me!"

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthresh'e hizmet etmekten daha ağır tek bir suç var: Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na ihanet edip valiye çanak tutmak. Muaran yolları gördü, geleceği gördü... Yüzündeki karanlık lekeyi nasıl göremedi? Lilaethan'ı bu pislikten kurtarmak için elinden gelen her şeyi yapmayı nasıl başaramadı?" {n}Yrliet'in sesi daha öfkeli, daha keskin çıkıyor.{/n} "Bu zehir zıkkımı Lilaethan'dan söküp atmadan önce Muaran'a hepsinin hesabını soracağım!"
